name: netdata
description: Netdata is a real-time performance monitoring platform for servers, containers, and applications. It provides actionable dashboards with alerts and metrics, supporting both self-hosted and SaaS deployments.
features: Real-time monitoring: Per-second metric collection and visualization for immediate system insights.
Comprehensive metrics: Track CPU, memory, disk, network, applications, and custom metrics automatically.
Interactive dashboards: Drill down into metrics with zoom, pan, and correlation features for analysis.
Anomaly detection: Machine learning algorithms identify unusual patterns and potential issues.
Alert notifications: Configure alerts with multiple channels including email, Slack, PagerDuty, and webhooks.
Zero configuration: Auto-detects services and starts monitoring immediately after installation.
Low overhead: Efficient C implementation uses minimal CPU and memory while collecting thousands of metrics.
Distributed monitoring: Aggregate metrics from multiple nodes into centralized dashboards.
Health monitoring: Built-in checks for common issues with actionable recommendations.
Container support: Monitor Docker, Kubernetes, and other containerized environments natively.
Plugin ecosystem: Extend monitoring with custom collectors for applications and services.
Historical data: Store and query metrics over time for trend analysis and capacity planning.
